markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Karumzek](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1654)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Karumzeks work with [Norgorberites](/Deities.aspx?ID=13) to further the secretive deity's goals.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Karumzek.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Karumzek](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1654)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 81

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), poison sense (precise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +12, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Poison Sense** A karumzek senses any [poisoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) creature. It can spend an action with the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait to determine the poison's type and current stage.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 60

</row>

**Immunities**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)

**Weaknesses**
good 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bite +12,
**Damage** 2d6+4 piercing plus karumzek venom

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 21
- **2nd**
[Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only), [Vomit Swarm](/Spells.aspx?ID=726)
- **Constant (2nd)**
[Negate Aroma](/Spells.aspx?ID=206)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)**  ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) A karumzek can take the shape of a Tiny spider. This doesn't change its Speed or Strikes.

**Karumzek Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [Virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162)) **Saving Throw** DC 19 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 3** 2d6 poison, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and enfeebled 1 (1 round)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-290" />
name: Karumzek
